title: Kerala veers from impressive social gains to mounting fiscal strain
content:
Kerala has a history of achieving impressive social gains.
*   The state is now experiencing mounting fiscal (financial) strain.
*   This marks a significant shift from its previous positive social trajectory towards financial challenges.

title: Odisha govt. clears investment proposals for 10 projects worth ₹44,241 crore
content:
The Odisha government has approved new investment proposals.
*   These approvals cover a total of 10 projects.
*   The combined value of these projects amounts to ₹44,241 crore.

title: AI Summit protest: Delhi court extends police custody of five Youth Congress members by four days
content:
Police custody for five Youth Congress members has been extended.
*   A Delhi court ordered this extension for an additional four days.
*   The members were initially taken into custody following a protest at an AI Summit.

title: Dream of Karnataka govt. jobs brings youth in droves to Dharwad’s coaching centres and study halls
content:
The dream of securing government jobs in Karnataka is a major draw for youth.
*   This aspiration is leading a large influx of young people to Dharwad.
*   They are congregating there to enroll in coaching centres and utilize study halls for job preparation.

title: Govt. mandates sale of 20% ethanol-blended petrol with minimum RON 95 nationwide from April 1
content:
The government has mandated the sale of petrol blended with 20% ethanol (E20).
*   This specific petrol blend must have a minimum Research Octane Number (RON) of 95.
*   The directive for nationwide implementation will come into effect from April 1.

title: AI Summit protest: Dramatic standoff between Delhi and Shimla police ends after 24 hours
content:
An AI Summit protest sparked an incident involving police.
*   A dramatic standoff occurred between Delhi and Shimla police forces.
*   The 24-hour confrontation between the two police departments has now ended.

title: Income Tax department conducts searches at lone BSP MLA house, U.P. Minister questions move
content:
Here's the summary in 3 bullet points:

*   The Income Tax department conducted searches at the residence of Uttar Pradesh's lone Bahujan Samaj Party (BSP) MLA.
*   The MLA is notably the sole representative of the BSP in the Uttar Pradesh assembly, making the targeting significant.
*   An Uttar Pradesh Minister publicly questioned the move, implying potential political motivations behind the search.

title: Two-child norm for panchayat, local body elections scrapped in Rajasthan after three decades
content:
Rajasthan has scrapped the two-child norm for candidates contesting panchayat and local body elections.
*   This particular norm had been in place in the state for three decades.
*   Its removal means individuals with more than two children are now eligible to contest these local elections.

title: NCERT apologises, says distribution of book with section on ‘corruption’ in judiciary stopped
content:
NCERT has issued an apology regarding one of its books.
*   The organization has stopped the distribution of this particular book.
*   The book included a controversial section that discussed 'corruption' in the judiciary.

title: A.P. shines with 23 medals at India Skills South Regionals
content:
Andhra Pradesh (A.P.) demonstrated a strong performance.
*   The state secured an impressive total of 23 medals.
*   This achievement took place at the India Skills South Regionals competition.
